meta.title: getBrandMetafieldsByBrandId - Catalog - API Reference
meta.description:
Gets a Metafield object list, by brand_id.

Responses

Send a Test Request

brand_id.description: The ID of the `Brand` to which the resource belongs.

page.description: Specifies the page number in a limited (paginated) list of products.

limit.description: Controls the number of items per page in a limited (paginated) list of products.

key.description: Filter based on a metafield's key.

namespace.description: Filter based on a metafield's key.

include_fields.description: Fields to include, in a comma-separated list. The ID and the specified fields will be returned.

exclude_fields.description: Fields to exclude, in a comma-separated list. The specified fields will be excluded from a response. The ID cannot be excluded.

blocks.data: An array of metafields and metadata.

data.description: Response payload for the BigCommerce API.

items.description: Allows app partners to write custom data to various resources in the API.

permission_set.description: Determines whether the field is completely private to the app that owns the field (`app_only`), or visible to other API consumers (`read`), or completely open for reading and writing to other apps (`write`).

namespace.description: Namespace for the metafield, for organizational purposes.

key.description: The name of the field, for example: `location_id`, `color`.

value.description: The value of the field, for example: `1`, `blue`.

resource_type.description: The type of resource with which the metafield is associated.

resource_id.description: The unique identifier for the resource with which the metafield is associated.

id.description: The unique identifier for the metafields.

created_at.description: Date and time of the metafield's creation.
